tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol STRING,
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    high DECIMAL,
    low DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE historical_stock_prices (
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    date DATE,
    opening_price DECIMAL,
    closing_price DECIMAL,
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
	stock_id INT,
	date DATE,
	open_price DECIMAL,
	high_price DECIMAL,
	low_price DECIMAL,
	close_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE StockPrices (
    stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    high_price DECIMAL,
    low_price DECIMAL
);
